name: RelaxingGameWithBalls
description:
Collide with "food" to gain points. Each collision makes it harder to play. Each 13 collisions bonus will appear.

Use WASD, Keys or joystick Axis to manipulate ball.

Hold L-SHIFT or A-Button on joystick to speed your ball up.

Press ESC or B-Button to exit the game.

Music in the game - "Reload - 4-4 Rhodes"

Game runs only in 600x400 mode
